body:
> 
> 
> @fantow 1ms is a very long time. When we use ResponseFuture, it should not have a chance to have more than 1ms for memory operations.
> 
> Do you find any usage that may result in wrong time span calculation?

IMHO,this ResponseFuture's timeoutMillis may cause something wrong when our machine sends more messages.
First,because writeAndFlush will call this Listener only if message can send to socket buffer,there are many scene will cause send buffer overflowed.So I think there is a good time to initialize the beginTime that when we actually send message(Plz ignore the time waste between socket buffer to NIC).

Second,when we invoke the function invokAysnc(),Our send capacity will be limited by the semaphore of Aysnc,We will wait for this semaphore when we send a lot of messages.I do not think that waiting for a semaphore to send message can cause sending timeout is a good result.

That is why I think we should initial this ResponseFuture's beginTime when the future's state is success.
@RealBar Your code is correct, but it must pass CI, otherwise it cannot be merged.

As a user, when you set a timeout of 3000ms, once he/she calls the api, if the api can not success after 3000ms, he/she should get a timeout exceptions. 

So even as you see, lots of messages may cost a 50ms delay sent, the user should got the expcetion after 3000ms rather than 3050ms

> 
> 
> As a user, when you set a timeout of 3000ms, once he/she calls the api, if the api can not success after 3000ms, he/she should get a timeout exceptions.
> 
> So even as you see, lots of messages may cost a 50ms delay sent, the user should got the expcetion after 3000ms rather than 3050ms

Thx,I agree with your answer when we use invoke funtion in a sync mode.

But as a user,I can not accept the send result is timeout when we send messages in an aync mode, this request can not get the sepahore in time.

In my opinion,timeout is used to limit the recv time ,not the send concurrency.

haTransferBatchSize

Coverage increased (+0.5%) to 51.832% when pulling **cc68e7d62cc65bb2707c6064166141295382f144 on crazywen:master** into **9f95a972e10e0681bc3f2d00e9957aa212e897b5 on apache:master**.

重现步骤：
1. 启动主节点，主节点配置加入haTransferBatchSize=8,388,608 （8M，超过4M） 压入一些数据，超过4M以上，尽量大些。
2. 这时启动从节点，在同一集群，拉取部分数据后，HaClient会陷入死循环，不再做数据同步。

what's your prolem exactly

新增商品后通知es服务 进行商品索引
按照rocketmq的流程
1. 发送消息给mq  
2. mq回调  商品服务器执行本地事务（新增商品和商品的一些关联信息）
3.mq 发送half消息给 es服务进行索引 

问题在：
第一步发送给mq的时候商品的部分数据是拿不到的比如 商品的id
导致发送给mq的half消息里面的商品信息是不完整的商品信息

执行本地事务失败（ROLLBACK）还是成功（COMMIT）是返回给RocketMQ 事务消息逻辑而不是业务端的，业务端具体是哪一种失败需要自己去记录。
如你所说，多个RocketMQTemplate会产生多个producer，性能上会有很轻微的损失，但不同事务消息的producer进行了隔离，代码逻辑更加清晰。具体使用哪一种方案，需要业务自己去权衡。

RocketMQ currently has the capability of master to slave consumer offset synchronization (via SlaveSynchronize), but there is no reverse path to save to master synchronization.

@crazywen Usually, the config of each node should keep the same in the same cluster(or at least for pair of master-slave which has the same broker name).
If so, just make sure haTransferBatchSize is equal or smaller than haReceiveBatchSize in the config file.

At least from your description, there's no attraction. All RocketMQ components are autonomously managed and do not depend on any third party. The maintenance cost is low. In addition, RocketMQ has good deployment capability of embedded devices, including edge devices. Currently, we are reabstracting storage layer. By combining storage devices, we will provide a more cost-effective serverless elastic architecture without compromising performance and latency.
The topic will be left to OpenMessaging for discussion. https://github.com/openmessaging/openmessaging-java/issues/20
